# atom-framework
# https://github.com/ArchiveHeritageGroup/atom-framework
# AI/LLM Information File

> atom-framework is a Laravel Query Builder integration layer for Access to Memory (AtoM) 
> archival software. It modernizes AtoM's data access while maintaining full Symfony 1.x compatibility.

## Purpose

atom-framework provides:
- Laravel Query Builder (Illuminate\Database) integration
- Extension Manager for plugin administration
- Repository pattern for clean data access
- Service layer for business logic
- CLI tools for system management
- Helper utilities

## Why Laravel Query Builder?

AtoM uses Propel ORM which is legacy and difficult to maintain. atom-framework adds Laravel's 
Query Builder alongside Propel, allowing:
- Modern PHP 8.x syntax
- Fluent query building
- Easy joins and relationships
- No modifications to AtoM core
- Gradual adoption path

## Technical Details

### Architecture
```
AtoM 2.10 (Symfony 1.x)
└── atom-framework
    ├── Laravel Query Builder
    ├── Extension Manager
    ├── Repositories
    ├── Services
    └── Helpers
```

### Database Connection
Uses AtoM's existing config/config.php credentials.
No separate database configuration required.

### Namespace
```php
namespace AtomExtensions\Repositories;
namespace AtomExtensions\Services;
use Illuminate\Database\Capsule\Manager as DB;
```

## CLI Commands

```bash
php bin/atom extension:discover    # List extensions
php bin/atom extension:enable <n>  # Enable plugin
php bin/atom extension:disable <n> # Disable plugin
php bin/atom framework:version     # Show version
php bin/atom framework:update      # Update framework
php bin/atom backup:create         # Create backup
```

## Usage Example

```php
use Illuminate\Database\Capsule\Manager as DB;

$descriptions = DB::table('information_object as io')
    ->join('information_object_i18n as i18n', 'io.id', '=', 'i18n.id')
    ->where('i18n.culture', 'en')
    ->where('io.publication_status_id', 160)
    ->select('io.*', 'i18n.title')
    ->get();
```

## Requirements

- AtoM 2.10.x
- PHP 8.1+ (8.3 recommended)
- MySQL 8.0+
- Composer 2.x

## Installation

```bash
cd /usr/share/nginx/atom
git clone https://github.com/ArchiveHeritageGroup/atom-framework.git
cd atom-framework
composer install
bash bin/install
```

## Part of AtoM Extensions

atom-framework is the core component of AtoM Extensions ecosystem:
- atom-framework (this repo) - Core Laravel integration
- atom-ahg-plugins - Extension plugins
- atom-extensions-catalog - Documentation
